name: part_001
file: tmp_【 3DLIVE 】#アキロゼ生誕祭2026 ーLife is GAMEー【ホロライブ⧸アキ・ローゼンタール】 [_tBlI-l8WLk]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Aki Rosenthal performing 'Bitter Choco Decoration' on stage.
MC section. Aki interacts with props on stage.
Aki Rosenthal performing 'Deal with the devil' with backup dancers.

subtitles.original: いや
subtitles.english: No,

subtitles.original: 元の位置が収らさるように
subtitles.english: so that the original position is settled,

subtitles.original: 話さるように 分からるように
subtitles.english: so that it is spoken, so that it is understood,

subtitles.original: でも競った口は閉ざさるように
subtitles.english: but so that the pursed mouth is closed,

subtitles.original: 笑わすように 笑われるように
subtitles.english: so as to make them laugh, so as to be laughed at,

subtitles.original: 人ちゃんと敬うように 崇めるように 讃えるように
subtitles.english: so as to properly respect, revere, and praise people,

subtitles.original: でもやっぱ有耶無耶にならないように
subtitles.english: but essentially, so it doesn't become vague,

subtitles.original: ふざけないように
subtitles.english: so as not to mess around.

subtitles.original: 集団参加の終止形
subtitles.english: The final form of group participation,

subtitles.original: またへーこらへーこら言っちゃって
subtitles.english: bowing and scraping again,

subtitles.original: あれ前髪超絶最強じゃん
subtitles.english: "Hey, your bangs are totally the best!"

subtitles.original: とかどうでもいいのに言っちゃって
subtitles.english: saying things I couldn't care less about.

subtitles.original: 毎朝毎晩もう限界
subtitles.english: Every morning, every night, I'm at my limit.

subtitles.original: 宗教的社会の集団リンチ
subtitles.english: Mass lynching in a religious society.

subtitles.original: でも決して発狂しないように
subtitles.english: But try absolutely not to go insane.

subtitles.original: ビターチョコデコレーション
subtitles.english: Bitter Choco Decoration.

subtitles.original: 兎角言わずに来な 愛は君を汚す
subtitles.english: Don't complain, just come. Love will dirty you.

subtitles.original: ビターチョコデコレーション
subtitles.english: Bitter Choco Decoration.

subtitles.original: 立つ鳥の後 濁す 濁す 後
subtitles.english: Leaving a mess behind as the bird flies away.

subtitles.original: 初めはあんな大層な大言壮語を並べたが
subtitles.english: At first, you lined up such grand, bombastic words,

subtitles.original: いやいや嫌よ嫌よも好きのうち
subtitles.english: No, no, "I hate it, I hate it" means I like it?

subtitles.original: いや早しかし今日が初めてで
subtitles.english: No, wait, but today is the first time,

subtitles.original: こんなとはね 君センスあるよ
subtitles.english: I didn't expect this. You have sense.

subtitles.original: 恋する季節にビターチョコデコレーション
subtitles.english: Bitter Choco Decoration in the season of love.

subtitles.original: 恋する気持ちでビターチョコデコレーション
subtitles.english: Bitter Choco Decoration with feelings of love.

subtitles.original: F.U.C.K.Y.O.U
subtitles.english: F.U.C.K.Y.O.U

subtitles.original: ビターチョコデコレーション
subtitles.english: Bitter Choco Decoration.

subtitles.original: 皆が望む理想に憧れて
subtitles.english: Longing for the ideal that everyone desires.

subtitles.original: ビターチョコデコレーション
subtitles.english: Bitter Choco Decoration.

subtitles.original: 個性や自我は全部焼き払い
subtitles.english: Burn away all individuality and ego.

subtitles.original: ビターチョコデコレーション
subtitles.english: Bitter Choco Decoration.

subtitles.original: 欲やエゴは殺して土に埋め
subtitles.english: Kill greed and ego and bury them in the earth.

subtitles.original: ビターチョコデコレーション
subtitles.english: Bitter Choco Decoration.

subtitles.original: 僕は大人にやっとなったよママ
subtitles.english: I've finally become an adult, Mama.

subtitles.original: 明日もきっとこの先も
subtitles.english: Surely tomorrow and in the future too,

subtitles.original: 地獄は続くどこまでも
subtitles.english: hell will continue on endlessly.

subtitles.original: あ だからどうか今だけは
subtitles.english: Ah, so please, just for now,

subtitles.original: 子供の頃の気持ちのままで
subtitles.english: let me stay with the feelings of my childhood,

subtitles.original: 一切を忘れてやってこうぜ
subtitles.english: let's forget everything and do it.

subtitles.original: あ 思い出した あの時の
subtitles.english: Ah, I remembered. That time...

subtitles.original: 生真面目そうな...
subtitles.english: looking so serious...

subtitles.original: やっぱいいや
subtitles.english: Actually, never mind.

subtitles.original: お…サイコロ
subtitles.english: Oh... A die.

subtitles.original: 5が出た
subtitles.english: It's a five.

subtitles.original: ん？何これ？
subtitles.english: Hmm? What is this?

subtitles.original: 椅子？
subtitles.english: A chair?

subtitles.original: After the war 世の常
subtitles.english: After the war, it's the way of the world.

subtitles.original: 崩れた跡しない
subtitles.english: No trace left after the collapse.

subtitles.original: 肝心なのは So na Money
subtitles.english: What's essential is that money.

subtitles.original: 出し抜いて Survive
subtitles.english: Outwit them and survive.

subtitles.original: 行き着く先は Heaven or Hell
subtitles.english: The destination is Heaven or Hell.

subtitles.original: この世界なる
subtitles.english: In this world,

subtitles.original: たった一つ 勝者こそが正義
subtitles.english: there is only one rule: the winner is justice.

subtitles.original: 女は度胸
subtitles.english: A woman needs courage.

subtitles.original: 焦らさせるの アイツを
subtitles.english: I'll keep him in suspense.

subtitles.original: やれること
subtitles.english: Whatever I can do,

subtitles.original: なんだってやる
subtitles.english: I'll do anything.

subtitles.original: アタシは 賭け狂いのQueen
subtitles.english: I am the compulsive gambling Queen.

subtitles.original: Deal with the devil 見透かして
subtitles.english: Deal with the devil, see through it.

subtitles.original: アタシのものにする
subtitles.english: I'll make it mine.

subtitles.original: あなたの髪の 一本まで全部
subtitles.english: Every single strand of your hair, everything.

subtitles.original: A million dollars, I'd say raise
subtitles.english: A million dollars, I'd say raise.

subtitles.original: 震えてるわよ坊や
subtitles.english: You're shaking, boy.

subtitles.original: 降ろさせはしないわ
subtitles.english: I won't let you fold.

subtitles.original: Deal with the devil uh 興奮
subtitles.english: Deal with the devil, ooh, the excitement.

subtitles.original: たまらないわ Thrill
subtitles.english: The thrill is unbearable.

subtitles.original: 誰にも触らせない このMoney
subtitles.english: I won't let anyone touch this money.

subtitles.original: A million dollars, I'd say raise
subtitles.english: A million dollars, I'd say raise.

subtitles.original: さあカモン 覚悟決めて
subtitles.english: Come on, steel your resolve.

subtitles.original: 震え高ぶれ My heart
subtitles.english: Tremble and rage, my heart.

subtitles.original: 欲しがるようじゃまだBaby
subtitles.english: If you just want it, you're still a baby.

subtitles.original: 誰にも負けない 感じさせて Love Honey
subtitles.english: I won't lose to anyone, let me feel it, Love Honey.

subtitles.original: あなたの内緒側
subtitles.english: Your secret side...
